frameDefinitions: In this frame a group of Individuals intentionally come together to form a Group.
An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.
A Device or machine is put in (or out of) service either by a volitional Agent or by a Cause event or force acting on the Device.
A Device or machine is in (or out of) service.
An Event continues at a certain Place through Time.
An Agent is performing the portion of an Activity in which there is dynamic stability. '' 'Not noticing the hoards of people rushing by the window, Manny continued eating his lunch.'
frameExamples: We <t>assembled</t> in the courtyard to talk about our future plans.
Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
The laborer realized that he <t>activated</t> the machine but did not know how to stop it.
Pyongyang agreed to suspend its withdrawal while talks <t>continued</t> with Washington.
Not noticing the hoards of people rushing by the window, Manny <t>continued</t> eating his lunch.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Individuals</fen> are self-movers who intentionally assemble together.
The <fen>Group</fen> describes the resulting formation of the <fen>Individuals</fen>.

<fen>Party_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in the assembling event.  It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_2</fen> previous to the assembling.
A grammatically less prominent participant in the assembling event.  It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_1</fen> previous to the assembling.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the assembling occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the assembling occurs.
This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
The <fen>Device</fen> or machine that is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who changes the operational state of the <fen>Device</fen>.
<fen>Cause</fen> identifies the non-agentive force that causes the <fen>Device</fen> to begin to operate.
The <fen>Time</fen> when a <fen>Device</fen> is put into or out of operation.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Device</fen> is put into or out of operation.
The <fen>Device</fen> or machine that is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Time</fen> when a <fen>Device</fen> is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Device</fen> is or is not operating.
Name of the <fen>Event</fen> which is continuing.
When the <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Event</fen> takes place.

Duration denotes the length of <fen>Time</fen> from the beginning of a continuous situation (the one denoted by the target) to its end. In many cases, the continuous situation is a dynamic action which is ongoing, while in others it is simply an undifferentiated state.
This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> occurs.
listRoleExamples: He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
<fex>The night lights</fex> were turned on in the secondary school.
Instantly <fex>Sue</fex> activated the commlink on the wall.
He was in his stocking feet while standing in the bayou that formed when <fex>the wind</fex> turned the shower on in that one upstairs bathroom.
My dad turned the lights on for me <fex>at 10 o'clock</fex>
Suddenly, the lights got turned on <fex>on the Jamaica road bridge</fex>.
<fex>Lights</fex> were on in the primary school
I do n't want to turn round cos the lights are on <fex>at the moment</fex>
Lights were on <fex>on the Kingston road bridge</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: EMD Power Business Segment Engineering Manager
